page.title: 05Hadley Shopping Centre
page.content: Hadley is a very modern shopping centre.On most days it is quiet but on Wednesdays it is noisy because of the {market.}The atmosphere is very nice,cheerful and friendly.There are not many stalls but they are very cheap and sometimes you can get a bargain. In the centre there are several different kinds of shops:Stars newsagent,Co-op,library,chemist,fish and chips,clothes shop,pet shop,wine shop,bakers,veg shop,fancy goods and butchers.There is also an optician,a bank,the information centre,a building society and a hairdresser.Cars are not allowed in the centre because there is a car park at the back.There is a Methodist church.Across from the shops is a pub called The Kings Head which is very popular.
